name: Zwobbles (DAE Studios)
description:
You play as a cuddle of Zwobbles, that in the beginning just exist of one Zwobble, your goal is to create a cuddle, a cuddle is a community of 6 Zwobbles. But be aware, having a big cuddle also means it’s more difficult to get to the end, maybe you have to sacrifice a zwobble here and there for the greater good.

  • 2D platformer
  • Singleplayer
  • Half an hour
  • People who like puzzle/platform games 

Team Zwobbles:

  • Robine De Roeck
  • Ioana Serban
  • Marnick Huysmans
  • Martijn Dhondt
